title: Tegenungan Waterfall Escape (Half-day)
overview: A refreshing half-day trip to one of Bali’s most popular waterfalls, with time for swimming and relaxation.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the waterfall, swim, and explore the area.
Relax with a drink or snack at a riverside café.

title: Waterfalls & Temples of Gianyar (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Tegenungan Waterfall, Goa Gajah, and nearby temples in Gianyar.

stops.description: Swim, relax, and enjoy the waterfall scenery.
Visit the ancient cave and temple.
See the holy spring temple in Tampaksiring.
